name: sample
description: The collection of data elements required to register the required Donor-Specimen-Sample data to the ARGO Data Platform. Registration of samples is required before molecular and clinical data submission can proceed.

fields.name: submitter_participant_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the participant, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: Source:MOH/ARGO;mCODE STU1: Patient.Identifer;mCODE2 STU2: Patient.Identifier;Phenopacket: Individual.id; Beacon V2: Individual.id

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: Source:MOH/ARGO;mCODE STU1: Specimen.Identifer;mCODE2 STU2: Specimen.Identifier;Phenopacket: Biosample.id; Beacon V2: Biosample.id

fields.name: submitter_sample_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sample, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: sample_type
fields.description: Description of the type of molecular sample used for testing.

meta.notes: Source:MOH/ARGO; Phenopacket : Biosample.sample_type; Beacon V2: Biosample.sample_type
